LiteratureReview¶

class litrevai.literature_review.LiteratureReview(path='./db', llm=None)¶

Literature Review manages access to projects, the database and the vector store.

create_project(name, exists_ok=True)¶

Creates a Project with the given (unique) name.

Parameters:

name (str) – Unique name to identify the project.

Return type:

Project

Returns:

Project that has been created.

delete_project(name)¶

Deletes the project with the given name. Raises an error if there is no project with the given name.

Parameters:

name (str) – Name of the project that should be deleted.

Returns:

get_item(item_key)¶

Returns the BibliographyItem for the given key. :type item_key: :param item_key: :return:

import_bibtex(path_to_bibtex, project=None)¶

Imports BibliographyItems into the database from a Bibtex File. The entries are expected to have a file field containing the absolute path to the corresponding PDF file.

Parameters:

  • path_to_bibtex (str)

  • project_id – Optional Project ID. Items are automatically added to the project

Returns:

import_zotero(zotero_path=None, filter_type_names=['journalArticle', 'conferencePaper'], filter_libraries=None)¶

Connects to a local instance of Zotero and add items that fit to the filter criteria.

Parameters:

  • zotero_path (Optional[str]) – Directory containing Zotero Files

  • filter_type_names (Optional[List[str]]) – One of -

  • filter_libraries (Optional[List[str]])

Returns:

property items: DataFrame¶

Returns all the items in the database as a DataFrame.

Returns:

DataFrame containing all items in the database.

property projects: Mapping[str, Project]¶

Provides access to projects.

Returns:

Returns a dict containing all projects which can be accessed by their names.

run_project(project_id, include_keys=None)¶

Runs over all items in a project

Parameters:

  • include_keys (Optional[List[str]])

  • project_id

Returns:

test_project(project_id)¶

Tests all queries from the project.

Parameters:

project_id

Returns:

to_bibtex(items, file_path=None)¶

Exports the items to a bibtex string. :type items: :param items: :type file_path: :param file_path: :rtype: str :return: Bibtex string

update_vector_store(redo=False)¶

Looks for items that have not been added to the vector store yet and adds them.

Parameters:

redo (bool) – If True, deletes all entries in the vector store before adding all items.

Return type:

None

Returns:

LitRevAI
